video.title: Urban Legends
video.synopsis: Each episode of this interactive series presents dramatizations of three urban legends, leaving viewers to figure out which are actually true.

episodes.synopsis: A junkie gets shot at close range; a sleeping man loses one of his kidneys; and a gang leader winds up dead.
episodes.title: Urban Legends: Season 1: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: A man is buried under a snow pile; a survivor escapes the weight of a four-ton road roller; and an army recruit is pushed to the edge.
episodes.title: Urban Legends: Season 1: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: A poodle dries in a microwave, Santa’s trip down the chimney brings Yuletide tragedy and a man designs his own flying machine.
episodes.title: Urban Legends: Season 1: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Hippies lose their eyesight after taking LSD, a streaker surprises a family restaurant and hunters blow up a very expensive vehicle.
episodes.title: Urban Legends: Season 1: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: A man meets his girlfriend’s father in an awkward way, a soldier has a broken neck for 60 years and a scuba enthusiast puts out a forest fire.
episodes.title: Urban Legends: Season 1: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: A straight-A student suffers a fatally painful exam, a woman encounters a powerful toilet and a groom's stag night goes horribly wrong.
episodes.title: Urban Legends: Season 1: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: A cat mimics her owner's every illness, another cat is rescued by the fire brigade and a feisty fish takes on a big man -- and wins the battle.
episodes.title: Urban Legends: Season 1: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: A cat's death leads to a disastrous dinner party, a landslide ruins a family's home and a husband goes to extremes to save his marriage.
episodes.title: Urban Legends: Season 1: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: A man takes on a corporate goliath using chocolate pudding, a Marine gets his just desserts and a cash-strapped dimwit ships himself home.
episodes.title: Urban Legends: Season 1: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: A man's life goes down the drain; an unsuspecting visitor gets locked up at the mental asylum; and a golfer has a fatal encounter with a water hazard.
episodes.title: Urban Legends: Season 1: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: A hospital bed claims the lives of all those who sleep in it; a Sicilian town spontaneously combusts; and a church choir has miraculous luck.
episodes.title: Urban Legends: Season 1: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: A philanderer is ratted out by a feathered friend; a dream car gets covered in concrete; and an adulterer wins the lottery but loses in love.
episodes.title: Urban Legends: Season 1: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: A couple unknowingly shares a hotel room with a corpse; an office spends a week with a dead body; and a family snacks on a cadaver.
episodes.title: Urban Legends: Season 1: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: A woman is struck by lightning twice; a man takes a dip in the Amazon River; and a woman licks an envelope infested with insect eggs.
episodes.title: Urban Legends: Season 1: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: A man's battle with a twister leaves him winded; a cow comes to an explosive end; and a legendary beauty endures great pain to preserve her looks.
episodes.title: Urban Legends: Season 1: Episode 15
